gproj 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

auto_family()

Choose a projection family based on data geometry

detect_rectilinear()

Test if 2D coordinate arrays are rectilinear (lon varies only along cols, lat varies only along rows)

gproj_region()

Create a gproj object centred on a point with a given radius

grid_spec()

Convenience: generate a grid specification from a gproj_region result

initial_bearing()

Initial bearing (forward azimuth) from point 1 to point 2 All inputs in degrees, output in degrees [0, 360)

pca_axis()

Compute the dominant axis of a set of lon/lat points via PCA on 3D cartesian

proj()

Build a PROJ string from params and a projection family or property

spherical_centroid()

Compute the centroid of lon/lat points via 3D cartesian mean

test_mercator_spacing()

Test whether a 1D latitude sequence follows Mercator spacing

test_regular_spacing()

Test whether a 1D coordinate sequence is uniformly spaced (regular)

viirs_eg()

viirs_swaths' An example swath source
